title: There's Something About Blaire
description: This is not a full length novel: 6k word count. This is a bonus scene from Blaire Dark Romance part 1 in Charlie’s point of View. To truly enjoy this bonus scene, I recommend you read Blaire part 1 first.  Excerpt from the bonus scene--  "She’s as ominous as hell. I can feel how much blood she’s got on her hands. Why haven’t I shot her already?"
author: Anita Gray
